attributes.action: Stop Welsh government given handouts and paying illegal migrants £1600 a month
attributes.additional_details: We need to use our taxes more intelligently other than being seen as a hand out country. This needs to stop and more support for British nationals are needed.
attributes.background: Put a stop to the Welsh gov giving hand outs to these illegal migrants of the sum of £1600 per month. We have never voted or want this with our taxes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the Welsh Government's pilot of a Basic Income for Care Leavers are a matter for the Welsh Government, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
